pageTitle: Improvement works at Regents Park station

title.title: Improvement works at Regents Park station

texts: Regent's Park station on the Bakerloo line will undergo essential lift maintenance work from 19-27 November as part of the TfL's five-year, Â£10bn investment programme.
Metronet Rail BCV, the company responsible for the maintenance and renewal of the Bakerloo, Central, Victoria and Waterloo & City lines, will carry out the works.
Regent's Park station's two lifts will be refurbished consecutively:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Lift one will be closed for refurbishment on the weekend of 19-20 November","Lift two will be closed for refurbishment on the weekend of 26-27 November."]}
Both lifts will remain in use during weekdays.

For 24-hour information on public transport in London, please call: 020 7222 1234.

TfL's Realtime pages display live travel information on London's public transport network: www.tfl.gov.uk/realtime
Journey Planner checks the transport network's status before providing results. The best available route is shown automatically: www.tfl.gov.uk/journeyplanner
Travel alerts via SMS and email can be set up at: www.tfl.gov.uk/alerts
